content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, there were no new developments to report. I received a command to generate an image of a world map.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command generate_image returned: Saved to disk:/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/08323847-9ce7-4121-835a-bf086c2d0931.jpg'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "resources for learning different languages"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html", "https://www.openculture.com/freelanguagelessons", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://matadornetwork.com/bnt/8-free-online-resources-for-learning-a-new-language/", "https://www.inc.com/larry-kim/9-places-to-learn-a-new-language-online-for-fre.html"]'}]
